00010 /* Purpose: Used to determine where a new activation is      */
00011 /*   placed on the agenda based on the current conflict      */
00012 /*   resolution strategy (depth, breadth, mea, lex,          */
00013 /*   simplicity, or complexity). Also provides the           */
00014 /*   set-strategy and get-strategy commands.                 */
00015 /*                                                           */

00017 /*      Gary D. Riley                                        */

00026 /*            compilation flag.                              */
00027 /*                                                           */
00028 /*      6.30: Added salience groups to improve performance   */
00029 /*            with large numbers of activations of different */
00030 /*            saliences.                                     */
00031 /*                                                           */
